ing: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  cream of celery soup
1 (20 ounce) package Simply PotatoesÂ® Shredded Hash Browns
1 cup Crystal FarmsÂ® Shredded Sharp Cheddar Cheese
1 cup corn flakes or seasoned croutons, coarsely crushed
1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley, if desired
n: Simply PotatoesÂ® Easy Au Gratin Potatoes
des: "Cooking for a crowd? This delicious, cheesy potato casserole recipe can easily be doubled. Just bake in a 13x9 glass baking dish and increase the baking time 5-10 minutes."
ins:
Heat oven to 350 degrees F. Spray 2 quart casserole dish with nonstick cooking spray*. In large bowl stir sour cream and soup until well blended. Add Simply Potatoes, cheese and onion; mix well. Spoon mixture into dish. Cover; bake 45 minutes.
In small bowl, combine corn flakes or croutons with butter. Sprinkle over Simply Potatoes.  Continue baking, uncovered, 20 to 25 minutes or until bubbly and golden brown. Sprinkle with parsley.
